apps.title: List of enabled apps
apps.description: Apps with their versions and associated directories that are enabled when saving or loading the configuration

version.title: Version of the app (typically a semantic version)

appDirectories.title: List of directories owned by the app
appDirectories.description: Describes the app directories contained in a configuration

appDirectory.title: App directory
appDirectory.description: Describes an app directory stored as part of a configuration

name.title: Path of the app directory in the configuration
name.description: Path of the app directory. Subdirectories are separated with /, no leading or trailing /

description.title: Title
description.description: Short description of the content of the directory. Will be displayed as part of a configuration.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: An optional icon which represents the app.

copyOnLoad.title: Copy on load
copyOnLoad.description: An app is responsible for persisting its configuration state to the app data folder. With copyOnLoad, the app is able to delegate this task to the Solutions app.

$schema.title: Link to configuration schema
$schema.description: Configuration schema defines the structure of configuration.json files

device.title: Device name
device.description: Name of the device where the configuration has been saved or loaded

user.title: Username
user.description: Name of the logged-in user who has saved or loaded the configuration
